item.text: From Jude, a slave of Jesus Christ and brother of James, to those who are called, wrapped in the love of God the Father and kept for Jesus Christ.
May mercy, peace, and love be lavished on you!

Dear friends, although I have been eager to write to you about our common salvation, I now feel compelled instead to write to encourage you to contend earnestly for the faith that was once for all entrusted to the saints.

For certain men have secretly slipped in among you—men who long ago were marked out for the condemnation I am about to describe—ungodly men who have turned the grace of our God into a license for evil and who deny our only Master and Lord, Jesus Christ.

Now I desire to remind you (even though you have been fully informed of these facts once for all) that Jesus, having saved the people out of the land of Egypt, later destroyed those who did not believe.

You <st data-num="5037" class="">also</st> know that<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> who did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> within <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="746" class="">proper domain</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="620" class="">abandoned</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> <st data-num="3613" class="">place of residence</st>, he has <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">in</st> <st data-num="126" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="1199" class="">chains</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2217">utter<n id="5" /> darkness</st>, locked up<n id="6" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st> of the <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">Day</st>.

So also Sodom and Gomorrah and the neighboring towns, since they indulged in sexual immorality and pursued unnatural desire in a way similar to these angels, are now displayed as an example by suffering the punishment of eternal fire.
Yet these men, as a result of their dreams, defile the flesh, reject authority, and insult the glorious ones.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> even<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> <st data-num="3413" class="">Michael</st> the <st data-num="743" class="">archangel</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="1256" class="">arguing</st> with the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> and <st data-num="1252" class="">debating</st> with him<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses’</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5111" class="">dare</st> to <st data-num="2018" class="">bring</st> a <st data-num="988" class="">slanderous</st> <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “May the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuke</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3778">these men</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">understand</st> the <st data-num="3745" class="">things</st> they <st data-num="987" class="">slander</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> they are being <st data-num="5351" class="">destroyed</st> <st data-num="1722">by</st> the <st data-num="3778">very things</st> that, <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="249" class="">irrational</st> <st data-num="2226" class="">animals</st>, they <st data-num="5447" class="">instinctively</st> <st data-num="1987" class="">comprehend</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>! <st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> they have <st data-num="4198" class="">traveled down</st> <st data-num="2535" class="">Cain’s</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> because of <st data-num="3408" class="">greed</st><n id="2" /> have <st data-num="1632" class="">abandoned</st> themselves<n id="3" /> to<n id="4" /> <st data-num="903" class="">Balaam’s</st> <st data-num="4106" class="">error</st>; <st data-num="2532" class="">hence</st>,<n id="5" /> they will certainly <st data-num="622" class="">perish</st><n id="6" /> in <st data-num="2879" class="">Korah’s</st> <st data-num="485" class="">rebellion</st>.

<st data-num="3778">These men</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4694">dangerous reefs</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="26">love feasts</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4910" class="">feasting</st> <st data-num="870" class="">without reverence</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="4165" class="">feeding</st> only <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>.<n id="5" /> They are<n id="6" /> <st data-num="504" class="">waterless</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="3507" class="">clouds</st>, <st data-num="3911">carried along</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="417">winds</st>; <st data-num="5352" class="">autumn</st> <st data-num="1186" class="">trees</st> <st data-num="175">without fruit</st><n id="8" />—<st data-num="1364" class="">twice</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dead</st>,<n id="9" /> <st data-num="1610">uprooted</st>;
wild sea waves, spewing out the foam of their shame; wayward stars for whom the utter depths of eternal darkness have been reserved.
Now Enoch, the seventh in descent beginning with Adam, even prophesied of them, saying, “Look! The Lord is coming with thousands and thousands of his holy ones,

to <st data-num="4160" class="">execute</st> <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">on</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1651" class="">convict</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5590">person</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> thoroughly <st data-num="763" class="">ungodly</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> they have <st data-num="764" class="">committed</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4642">harsh words</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="765" class="">ungodly</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st> have <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”<n id="5" />
These people are grumblers and fault-finders who go wherever their desires lead them, and they give bombastic speeches, enchanting folks for their own gain.
But you, dear friends—recall the predictions foretold by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, “<st data-num="1909">At</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">end</st> of <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">come</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1703" class="">scoffers</st>, <st data-num="4198" class="">propelled</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their own</st> <st data-num="763" class="">ungodly</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3778">These people</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="592" class="">divisive</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5591" class="">worldly</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361 4151">devoid</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="27" class="">dear friends</st>, by <st data-num="2026" class="">building</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="2026" class="">up</st> in <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="40" class="">most holy</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st> in the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5083" class="">maintain</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> while <st data-num="4327" class="">anticipating</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1656" class="">mercy</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> that <st data-num="1519" class="">brings</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="3" />
<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> have <st data-num="1653" class="">mercy</st> on those <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1252">waver</st>;
save others by snatching them out of the fire; have mercy on others, coupled with a fear of God, hating even the clothes stained by the flesh.
Now to the one who is able to keep you from falling, and to cause you to stand, rejoicing, without blemish before his glorious presence,
to the only God our Savior through Jesus Christ our Lord, be glory, majesty, power, and authority, before all time, and now, and for all eternity. Amen.
